title: AstroNuvi
subtitle: Hardik Gupta
description:
The Future of Astrology is Here
AstroNuvi is revolutionizing astrology with a modern, tech-first approach rooted in ancient knowledge. Powered by our in-house HUMAI model, RatnAI, we offer: Instant, AI-generated horoscopes, Affordable, certified gemstones, Expert insights you can actually rely on. We’re making astrology accessible, digital, and real — no vague predictions, no drama, just trusted tools to help you navigate life. Rewrite Fate, the Nuvi way.

title: SphereX
subtitle: Deepraj Banerjee
description: Choose Your Sphere. Have a great project idea, but no one to build it with? We get it — working alone is tough, and finding like-minded collaborators is even harder. That’s where SphereX comes in: a platform designed to connect thinkers, creators, and builders. Whether you’re looking for teammates, brainstorming partners, or simply a space to start something impactful — SphereX is where your ideas find a team. But here’s the twist — we’re building SphereX, and we need YOU. If you’re excited to shape a community-driven innovation space from scratch, come help us build the next big thing.

title: Reader’s Fleet
subtitle: Hritika Shankdhar
description:
Connecting Readers and Authors Like Never Before.
What if you could help build the next big thing for readers and authors across India? That’s the mission of Readers’ Fleet, a community-driven platform where book lovers can: Connect through genre-based communities, chat directly with their favorite authors, discover books via AI-powered recommendations, track their reading journey with streaks and badges …and that’s just the beginning. We’re creating a fun, gamified, and deeply personalized experience for readers who are ready for more than just “one more chapter.”

title: Aahar
subtitle: Debansh Hota
description:
Because Ghar Ka Khaana Just Got Smarter
Aahar is India’s first hyper-personalized diet recommendation platform that respects your roots. Our goal? To blend technology with tradition by offering diets that: Factor in your health conditions (like PCOD, BP, etc.), Align with what’s available in your local markets, Stay true to family-approved food wisdom. We’re replacing one-size-fits-all diet charts with real, desi, science-backed nutrition — and if you think anda-bread can be a lifestyle, you’re already one of us.
